item.title: Connect vROps to vRO
item.description: Extending vRealize Operations with vRealize Orchestrator Sometimes it's a good thing to connect vRealize Orchestrator to vRealize Operations to be able to do actions and remedies based on alerts in vRealize Operations. Another thing that this connection provides is the possibilities to run Orchestrator workflows directly from vRealize Operations objects. How we do this - in details, now! Prerequisites You will need: vRealize Orchestrator installed This can either be included together with vRealize Automation, or, a standalone Orchestrator solution.
